title: adam2531
author: adam2531
content: Hello Friends,Now you don't need to spend 1000's of dollars every month/year to advertise your online projects as now viralds4u.com has launched its lifetime advertising membership plan for a very limited time and for a very limited number of accounts.If you want to gain this awesome opportunity then you need to visit viralads4u.com and after sign up for free just upgrade your membership to "VIP" level for a one time price of $349 and your membership will be locked for lifetime without spending any extra dime on monthly/yearly basis.As a "VIP" member you will recieve lifetime advertising which includes:14700000 ad credits on upgrading which you can use to buy any ads packages plus in your members area you will get access to coupon codes which provides you the following additional ads for lifetime:Additional 1250000 credits13 Lifetime Banners with unlimited views25 Banners with 100000 views each25 Text links with 100000 views each25 login ads with 100000 views each25 Full page ads with 100000 views eachAll this for a single one time payment for lifetime and that's not it. You will occasionally find new coupon codes specially for "VIP" members with additional advertising packages from time to time.So, grab this awesome opportunity as this lifetime membership plan will be available for a limited number of users and after this you can grab this same membership plan on an yearly payment basis. So grab your spot while its last.Sign up and upgrade your membership now at viralads4u.com
